name: @shm-open/react-native-alipay
description: Alipay SDK for React Native. Support RN >= 0.47.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.sync-to-app: if [ $SHM_APP_SOURCE_PATH ]; then msf ./ $SHM_APP_SOURCE_PATH/node_modules/@shm-open/react-native-alipay; else tail -f /dev/null; fi
scripts.release: npm test && npm run build && standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish

author: shihuimiao
